wiki.summary: On “Thousand Miles,” The Kid LAROI sings about his journey through recent relationships, sharing troubles he has with them. A snippet of the song was first previewed on LAROI’s Instagram story in January 2021 and once again in a Twitch Livestream the following month. In an August concert in London, he performed the song in its entirety. Due to LAROI’s continued teasing of the track, it is expected to be his next release as a lead single for his 2022 debut album. This song set to be released April 22 Read more on Last.fm.
